meanings.definition: A person or company that provides goods or services to another.
meanings.sent1: The supplier delivered fresh vegetables to the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The supplier restocked the shelves with new products.
meanings.sent3: The supplier accidentally sent a crate of bananas to the zoo instead of the grocery store!
meanings.sent4: She was a reliable supplier of creativity, always coming up with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The supplier's truck was filled to the brim with supplies for the construction site.

meanings.definition: One who supplies or furnishes something.
meanings.sent1: The supplier of office equipment brought in new desks and chairs.
meanings.sent2: As a supplier of knowledge, he always had interesting facts to share.
meanings.sent3: The supplier of jokes had everyone laughing at the party.
meanings.sent4: She was a supplier of comfort, always ready with a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The supplier of tools made sure everyone had what they needed for the project.
